definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: My 6-year old brother and I became her constant bodyguards.
sentences.chinese: 我和6歲的弟弟成了她的貼身保鏢。

sentences.english: Why can you have fatso little brother?
My little brother always forgets to wash behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 我的小弟弟老是忘記洗耳後根。

sentences.english: The students feared any siblings would steal their parents exclusive love, Wang said.
sentences.chinese: 這些學生擔心弟弟妹妹會分走自己獨享的父母寵愛。

sentences.english: He never makes his brother do heavy work.
sentences.chinese: 他從不讓他弟弟乾重活。

sentences.english: His face was badly clawed by his little brother.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉被小弟弟抓壞了。

sentences.english: Brother scold by white Mary cried.
It is YangYong pendulum beating a love princess brother named werder.
sentences.chinese: 擺擂的正是楊勇的一個愛妃的弟弟，名叫雲達。

sentences.english: My brother is ill-tempered, and always stirs up trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟的脾氣很暴躁，常惹是生非。

sentences.english: My brother and I took a small washbasin came to the pond.
sentences.chinese: 我和弟弟拿着一個小臉盆來到池塘邊。

sentences.english: The picture on right was me, my brother, and relatives in Beijing in 1966.
sentences.chinese: 最右方的圖是1966年和弟弟及姨表們在北京。

sentences.english: I awoke when my brother threw the dog to my bed.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟把小狗扔到我牀上時我醒了。

sentences.english: When she saw her brother she asked him about the twins.
sentences.chinese: 她一見到弟弟，便問他有關雙胞胎的事。

sentences.english: It was Xuedong who (that) met your brother in the street yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 小冬昨天在街上碰到的是你弟弟。

definition: younger male cousin via female line
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
